definitions.definition: A stoneware or earthenware jar or storage container .
A piece of broken pottery, a shard .
( UK ) A person who is physically limited by age, illness or injury.
( UK ) An old or broken-down vehicle (and formerly a horse or ewe ).
( slang , Canada , US , countable and uncountable ) Silly talk, a foolish belief, a poor excuse, nonsense.
( medical slang , derogatory ) A patient who is difficult to treat, especially one who complains of a minor or imagined illness .

main_definition: A stoneware or earthenware jar or storage container .
secondary_definitions: A piece of broken pottery, a shard .
( UK ) A person who is physically limited by age, illness or injury.
( UK ) An old or broken-down vehicle (and formerly a horse or ewe ).
( slang , Canada , US , countable and uncountable ) Silly talk, a foolish belief, a poor excuse, nonsense.
( medical slang , derogatory ) A patient who is difficult to treat, especially one who complains of a minor or imagined illness .

definitions.definition: The loose black particles collected from combustion , as on pots and kettles, or in a chimney; soot ; smut .
Colouring matter that rubs off from cloth.

main_definition: The loose black particles collected from combustion , as on pots and kettles, or in a chimney; soot ; smut .
secondary_definitions: Colouring matter that rubs off from cloth.
